overview:
Responsible for inaugural US based sales team. Direct management of inside and outside sales executives. Report directly to Vice President of Sales.

Cotendo is a Sequoia Capital and Benchmark Capital backed company–

Cotendo is a content delivery network and an innovator of software-focused CDN technologies. Cotendo’s full suite of content delivery applications is addressing an important unmet need that Internet content providers have for application-level flexibility and sophisticated management of performance and cost. Founded in 2008.
